name: Grand Theft Auto V
notes: If the download doesn't work after the installation change the executable (right-click -> configure -> Game options) to GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto V/PlayGTAV.exe (and click on retry if you get an error at the first try). When the download is complete change it back to GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto V/GTAVLauncher.exe If what happens in this video is happening to you try deleting any .part files that you find in your GTAV directory and relaunch. If you receive "Failed: zlib call" verify your game files.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto V/PlayGTAV.exe

setup.url: N/A:Select the installer for the game. You can download it from here https://socialclub.rockstargames.com/activate

task.description: Installing the game. You might get an error at the end of the installation, just close the installer window and don't click on retry
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: GTAV_Setup_tool.exe
    url: N/A:Select the installer for the game. You can download it from here https://socialclub.rockstargames.com/activate
game:
  arch: win64
  args: -noChunkedDownload -DX11
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Rockstar Games/Grand Theft Auto V/PlayGTAV.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating win64 prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: arial win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing the game. You might get an error at the end of the installation,
      just close the installer window and don't click on retry
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
  overrides:
    winedbg.exe: disabled
  version: lutris-4.13-x86_64
